title: ImTOO Video Converter Ultimate 7.8.7.20150209 Final Incl. Patch
description:
ImTOO Video Converter Ultimate 7.8.7.20150209 [MulTi] | 36 MB

Release-Type..: Utillity
OS............: Windows
Language......: [MulTi]

ImTOO Video Converter - a versatile, fast, easy to use video converter. Allows you to convert and edit video, audio, and animated images. The program - one of the leading video converter for processing high-definition video: H.264 / MPEG-4 AVC, AVCHD (*. M2ts, *. MTS), MKV, WMV HD, TS HD MPEG2 / MPEG-4. Supports 150 video formats, can convert movies from HD to SD, convert various general video formats: AVI, MPEG-4, WMV, DivX, H.264 / AVC and others.

Converts normal video to 3D video for viewing on a standard TV or 3D, as well as (when you do not have 3D TV) converts formats stereo pair / top and bottom 3D video in anaglyph red / blue 3D video (3D in 3D). There are functions to extract audio and images from video, as well as the creation of a video presentation of the photographs and their subsequent editing, sharing, association, pruning. In your video project, you can add subtitles in various formats, decorate with the effects of a given duration, select the desired format for viewing on portable media devices. Technology AMD or NVIDIA CUDA will enable you to handle large projects to remove the load on the processor and convert your videos faster.

Functional features.
Video Converter popular formats.
Support MPG, WMV, MP4, 3GP, MOV, RM, DVD, VCD, AVI, ASF and other formats.
Extract audio tracks from video files and save as MP3, WAV, AC3, WMA, M4A, OGG, AAC and other formats.
Selection and setup parameters of converting (brightness, contrast, saturation, etc.).
Setting 3D, anaglyph.
Applying artistic effects ("Woodcarving", "Old Film", "shadow", "Blinds", "Gravel" ...).
Add ASS, SSA or SRT subtitle, and set its positioning and style.
Connect to any decoder or codec configuration parameters.
Supports decoding and encoding HD video as HD AVI, HD MPEG2, HD MPEG2 TS, HD MPEG4, WMV HD, HD VOB, HD ASF, H.264 / MPEG-4 AVC, AVCHD (*. M2TS, *. MTS) MKV, WMV HD, MPEG2 / MPEG-4 TS HD, etc.
Ability to extract images from your video formats PG, PNG, GIF, and BMP or create a video from your photos in HD or SD formats.
Support MPEG1; MPEG2; MPEG4 (DivX4 / DivX5); WMV7; WMV8; H263 (+); MJPEG; ; DV; Huff YUV; On2 VP3; MPEG audio layer 2; MPEG audio layer 1/3; AC3; Vorbis; WMA; AAC; Microsoft ADPCM; G.726 ADPCM; DV audio; FLAC and other audio and video codecs.

Preview player.
Easy to use graphical interface. Changing the interface by switching skins.
Setting the size of the output file. Find out the exact size of the output file with the built-counter bitrate.
Batch convert.
Support for multi-core processors.

Supported formats and devices.

Supported input formats.
- Video: AVI, MPEG, WMV, MP4, FLV, MKV, H.264 / MPEG-4, DivX, XviD, MOV, M4V, VOB, ASF, 3GP, 3G2, SWF, H.261, H.264, DV , DIF, MJPG, MJPEG, DVR-MS, NUT, QT, YUV, DAT, MPV, NSV.
- HD Video: AVCHD Video (* .mts, * .m2ts), H.264 / MPEG-4 AVC (* .mp4), MPEG2 HD Video (* .mpg; * .mpeg), MPEG-4 TS HD Video ( * .ts), MPEG-2 TS HD Video (* .ts), Quick Time HD Video (* .mov), WMV HD Video (* .xwmv), Audio-Video Interleaved HD Video (* .avi).
- Audio: MP3, WMA, AAC, WAV, CDA, OGG, FLAC, APE, CUE, M4A, RA, RAM, AC3, MP2, AIFF, AU, MPA, SUN AU Format.
- Images: BMP, GIF, JPEG, PNG.

Supported output formats.
- Video: AVI, MPEG, WMV, MP4, FLV, H.264 / MPEG-4, DivX, XviD, MOV, RM, ASF, 3GP, 3G2, SWF, VOB, TS, DV H.264 / MPEG-4 AVC (* .mp4), MPEG2 HD Video (* .mpg; * .mpeg), MPEG-4 TS HD Video (* .ts), MPEG-2 TS HD Video (* .ts), Quick Time HD Video (*. mov), WMV HD Video (* .wmv), Audio-Video Interleaved HD Video (* .avi).
- Audio: MP3, WMA, AAC, WAV, OGG, FLAC, APE, M4A, RA, AC3, MP2, AIFF, AMR, SUN AU Format.
- Images: BMP, GIF, JPEG, PNG.

Supported devices.
- iPod, iPod nano, iPod classic, iPod shuffle, iPod touch.
- iPhone, iPhone 3G, Apple TV.
- PSP, PS3.
- Xbox, Xbox 360.
- General 3GP mobile phone, BlackBerry and others.
- General MP4 players: Archos, Creative Zen, iRiver and others.
- Window Mobile device: Pocket PC, Dell Axim X51, HP iPaq hw6500 series and others.
